name: Dice Of Bone
description:
You've died. Congratulations! But before you take a one-way trip down the river Styx, the boss of the underworld (Death) offers you a game for your life...

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left Click to use ability

Gameplay

Collect dice to fill your stack (Max. 6)

Each die in the stack represents an ability, left click to use the top die in the stack

Each enemy killed grants 50 points

Get 1000 points to win

Types Of Dice:

Bomb - drop a slot machine that explodes after a short time

Dash - dash in  the direction of your mouse

Heal - heal an amount of your health

Melee - hit an opponent with a bone

Parry - deflect projectiles with a playing card

Ranged - throw a poker chip
